segments.text: She is , like , mega-intense , isn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha , she is unstoppable . I'm learning so much from her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's it like to work with her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's demanding . But I like that . I mean , I know our timeline is tight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You guys are working around the clock , I know . That guy Dave next to Zina never leaves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Vince wants us to have everything debugged and ready to go by the end of the month .
segments.speaker: S1
